TABLE.NAME: bigbluebuttonbn
TABLE.COMMENT: The bigbluebuttonbn table to store information about a meeting activities.

FIELD.NAME: bbb_meeting_duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Duration of the BBB meeting. Needed for destroying the machine when using servers on demand.

TABLE.NAME: bigbluebuttonbn_logs
TABLE.COMMENT: The bigbluebuttonbn table to store meeting activity events

TABLE.NAME: bigbluebuttonbn_openstack
TABLE.COMMENT: Table that stores the activity of the stacks hosting the meetings. Used only when OpenStack integration is enabled.

FIELD.NAME: stack_name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the instance of the stack that hosts the BBB server.

FIELD.NAME: meetingid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the conference hosted in the stack.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course that owns the conference hosted in the stack.

FIELD.NAME: bbb_server_status
FIELD.COMMENT: Current status of the BBB server.

FIELD.NAME: bbb_server_url
FIELD.COMMENT: URL of the BigBlueButton server hosting the meeting. This field is used when creation of servers on demand is enabled.

FIELD.NAME: bbb_server_shared_secret
FIELD.COMMENT: Shared secret of the BigBlueButton server hosting the meeting. This field is used when creation of servers on demand is enabled.

FIELD.NAME: meeting_duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Duration of the BBB meeting. Needed for destroying the machine when using servers on demand.

FIELD.NAME: openingtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Start time of the conference

FIELD.NAME: deletiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when is scheduled to end the meeting.

TABLE.NAME: bigbluebuttonbn_os_logs
TABLE.COMMENT: Table that stores lifecycle events of the stacks hosting the meetings. Used only when OpenStack integration is enabled.

FIELD.NAME: event_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the event.

FIELD.NAME: meetingid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the conference hosted in the stack.

FIELD.NAME: stack_name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the instance of the stack that hosts the BBB server.

FIELD.NAME: log_level
FIELD.COMMENT: Log level of the event.

FIELD.NAME: component
FIELD.COMMENT: Component responsible for the event ocurrence.

FIELD.NAME: event
FIELD.COMMENT: Event whithin the lifecycle of the stack.

FIELD.NAME: event_details
FIELD.COMMENT: Details of the event.

TABLE.NAME: bigbluebuttonbn_reservations
TABLE.COMMENT: Table that register BBB servers reservations. Used only when OpenStack integration is enabled.

FIELD.NAME: start_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp to start usign OpenStack resources.

FIELD.NAME: finish_time
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp to free OpenStack resources.

FIELD.NAME: begin_date
FIELD.COMMENT: Begin date in a human redable format

FIELD.NAME: end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: End date in a human redable format

FIELD.NAME: user_info
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the user who ask for reservation.

FIELD.NAME: course_info
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the course related to reservation.

FIELD.NAME: meetingid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the conference reserved.
